Name: Gestalt Engineering Bay
Description: Provide upgrades for Gestalt Squad, unlocking corrresponding equipment after being promoted.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Equip Medical Detector. Grant Precursor Squad detection, and group healing at rate of 6 per sec.
Root.Name: Research Medical Detector

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip: Equip Regenerative Stim. Enable Raider Squad to receive a dose of Regenerative Stim. It will continuously heal the squad and increase their speed by 20%. Last 20 sec.
Root.Name: Research Regenerative Stim

Root.Tooltip: Equip Terminator EXO. Grant Precursor Squad and Raider Squad additional health, armor, and 15% dmg reduction. This will also allow them to use blink ability.
Root.Name: Research Terminator EXO Teleport

Root.Tooltip: Equip Jetpack. Enable Raider Squad to jump to target location and knock off nearby enemy ground units after landing.
Root.Name: Research Jetpack

Root.Tooltip: Equip Spider Mine. Enable Infiltrator Squad to deploy 9 Spider Mines to target location. Mines can sense and attack nearby enemies and deal massive amount of aoe dmg.
Root.Name: Research Deploy Spider Mine

Root.Tooltip: Equip Stim Gauntlet. Enable Infiltrator Squad to receive a dose of stim after attacked by enemies. It will increase their movement speed and heal them. Last for 5 sec.
Root.Name: Research Stim Gauntlet

Root.Tooltip: Equip Cochannel Hacking Device. Enable Infiltrator Squad to paralyze target mechanic unit and stun it for 10 sec. Cannot target heroic unit.
Root.Name: Research Cochannel Hacking

Root.Tooltip: Equip Duplex Robotic Arm. Enable Precursor Squad to fix a mechanic unit at rate of 50 per sec. It will also increase movement and atk speed of mechanic units near Precursor Squad.
Root.Name: Research Mechanical Maintenance
